title: Mr & Mrs 420 Again
overview: Balli, a film director, looks for a surrogate mother. Jass, a struggling actor, auditions as Reshma, an item girl, and is chosen. Meanwhile, Jagga, fleeing from MLAâ€™s goons, disguises himself as Jugni. Balli contacts Reshma for surrogacy, while his wife contacts Jugni for the same.
